resources.string: A smart wallpaper that automatically adapts to the weather, time of day, and location.
Summer Update will be available on June 22nd! Remember to update!
The application will automatically change the wallpaper on your smartphone and adjust it to the weather conditions and the time of day.
Now you know what the weather is like outside right now!
What to do if the application doesn\'t change wallpapers?
Check your internet access and ensure location is enabled!

The application works in the background. Sometimes, the system\'s battery management might stop it. If the wallpapers stop changing after a while, please ensure that Weatpaper has permission to run in the background and disable battery optimization for it. If you need help, click the button below for instructions.
If you have a problem, contact me and I will help you find a solution!
